name: Pokémon Diamond
overview: Pokémon Diamond and Jade are bootlegged versions of Keitai Denjuu Telefang 1. The Power Version was used to make Diamond, and the Speed Version became Jade. Along with a Chinese version, partly-translated German and Spanish versions also exist. Pokémon Jade has also been used for the name for an edited version of a pirated game called Sonic Adventures 7.
